message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about the role of worms in composting. Option (A) is not related to the role of worms in composting. Option (C) is unrelated to the topic and is not supported by any evidence. As they move through the compost, they break down the materials further, releasing more vitamins and nutrients into the compost.
